name: Surglasses Inc.
description: Developer of an augmented reality (AR) surgical navigation system designed to improve smart healthcare. The company's platform offers AR surgery for orthopedics and neurosurgery in high-performance surgical systems and educational products. enabling healthcare professionals to perform surgeries with precision and efficiency and advanced innovative products for medical education.
